## Summary
What problem does this feature solve? Who benefits?

## Proposal
Describe the solution, user flow, and any alternatives considered.

## Scope

- Dependencies or blockers

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

## Additional Context
Links, mockups, diagrams, or related issues.
